Dear {!Contact.Name},
Through my research I have identified {!Account.Name} as an enterprise that would greatly benefit from a customized procurement program offered through our Business Solutions Division.
Office Depot Business Solutions works with companies to create and implement programs that reduce Total Costs of Ownership.
Some of the benefits {!Account.Name} would experience are:
Current Program Consult
Targeted product savings (typically over 15%)
Customized “Core-list” for maximum cost containment on the products most important to you
Customized E-Procurement System at www.business.officedepot.com
Real Time Reporting that is clear and measurable
Consolidated and customized billing options
Professional program implementation
Vendor Consolidation: Cleaning and Facilities, Technology, Print
In-Store purchasing options
Proactive, dedicated Account Management with meaningful business reviews
With targeting the lowest total delivered costs in our industry, Office Depot Business Solutions has proven to exceed customer’s expectations.
I respectfully ask for the opportunity to start a discovery conversation to explore your customized program benefits.
Thank you for your consideration and I look forward to your reply or feel free to call me to discuss.
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Market__c}
{!User.Phone} {!User.Extension}
{!User.Email}
